explains: v. 起超导体作用（superconduct 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: superconducting magnet 超导磁体；超导磁铁
superconducting material 超导体，超导材料

sentences.en: They made four-molecule-long wires - the smallest superconducting structure yet reported.
sentences.cn: 他们制作了四个分子长的金属线——目前有报道最小的超导体。

sentences.en: The niobium superconducting cavities shown here could prove useful for waste transmutation.
sentences.cn: 此处展示的铌超导腔已经证明可以用于废料嬗变。

sentences.en: These compounds can become superconducting by being exposed to oxygen, but it takes months.
sentences.cn: 这些化合物通过接触氧气而带有超超导性，但是这个过程需要数月才能完成。
